permissions: Admins can update T3 EquipmentShare vehicle assignments. Non-admins can update when they are members of the vehicle broker organization.
side_effects: Updates trailer and/or tractor relationships on the T3 EquipmentShare vehicle; providing an empty value clears the relationship.
validation_notes: At least one of --trailer or --tractor must be provided. The <id> argument is required and must be a non-empty T3 EquipmentShare vehicle ID.
